p: The WHO also released detailed recommendations on the use of face masks within the population, during home care, and in COVID-19 health care settings [ 71]. Health care staff are advised to use particulate respirators such as those licensed N 95 or FFP 2 while conducting aerosol-generating procedures and to use surgical masks when providing any treatment for suspected or confirmed cases. As per these guidelines an individual without respiratory symptoms when in public is not required to wear medical mask. To avoid any increase in risk of transmission proper use and disposal of masks is important [ 71].
